transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir good morning IndiaMART se Karan baat kar raha tha.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir.
Executive: Sir kal maine aapko ticket ka reference number bhi bheja tha aur ye bhi bataya tha ki internal ticket maine khol diya buyer supplier ke liye still aapne mail pe na not satisfied mark kiya tha. To kya problem aa rahi hai sir abhi?
Customer: Sir aapne kaha tha ki call aayega unka dispute team ka na to kal koi call aaya na ab tak koi call aaya.
Executive: Sir uske upar action to ho raha hai aur call zarur aayega. But agar waisi wali problem thi.
Customer: Ji baat pata hai kya hai Karan ji baat pata kya hoti hai sir aap mujhe kuch batate ho hota kuch hai baad mein. Theek hai main matlab is cheez mein main bada confuse ho jata hu aap logon ke service mein.
Executive: Sir maine aapko ye bola tha ki sham tak aapko dispute team call kar legi.
Customer: Haan ab aap batao mujhe agar unhone call kiya ho.
Executive: Nahi kiya. But sir ab bhi 11 bajne wale hai ab bhi koi call nahi aaya kisi ka na koi mail aaya na koi call aaya.
Customer: Sir ye wala ticket hai ye direct ne aap directly aapne mere upar issue kiya tha theek hai ab wo ticket maine samne wali team ke upar dala hai ki aap samne wale ko call kyu nahi karte. pata hai kya hai sir ye ticket kisne kya kiya ye sab mujhe nahi pata na dekho mere ko to jo issue hai maine to wo raise kiya hai. Haan jab tak wo cheez mere ko mere samne aayegi nahi mere se koi contact nahi karega wo cheez sort out matlab mujhe lagega hi nahi ki us cheez pe kaam ho raha hai main kya karunga.
Executive: Achcha sir ab aap ek baat bataiye main koi aapko waisi baat.
Customer: Ya to aap mujhe ye kehte ya to aap mujhe ye kehte ki sir do din mein aapke paas call aayega main do din ka wait karta. Sir aap mujhe aap mujhe instant wo kar dete ho ki haan ye cheez ho gayi hai sir aur fir wo cheez hoti nahi hai kabhi bhi. Aise hi aapke manager ke phone aate hai mere paas sir sir pata kya hai do minute meri baat sun lo aap khud aapke manager ke mere paas call aate hai do teen din mein. Hmm.
Executive: Nahi sir aapki baat sun.
Customer: Ki aapko kya issue aa raha hai ye matlab main sari issue bata chuka hu aapko khud personally pata hai mere ko kya issue aa raha hai. Hmm. Matlab main sari cheeze share kar chuka hu fir matlab mere ko call karke kehte hai kya issue aa raha hai matlab main ab tak yahi nahi samajh pa raha hu ki main meri hi koi kami hai samjhane mein ya aap log hi nahi samajhna chah rahe. 
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir aapke samjhane mein koi kami nahi hai.
Customer: Ab batao fir mere sath pata nahi kya ho raha hai ek do client mushkil mein teen saal mein jude the mere sath IndiaMART se maine aapko bataya tha aur usi mein ye ho gaya mere sath to dekho 50000 ka 60000 ka matlab jo bhi iska payment pending hai ye yahi pada hai aur matlab fayde ki jagah aur ulta nuksan hi ho raha hai mujhe ye tha ki IndiaMART pe hai to banda verified hoga genuine hoga. Hmm. Ab batao wohi banda fraud nikla hai.
Executive: Ab sir aisa hua hai.
Customer: Baaki jo dispute team se call aayega ye hai wo hai.
Executive: Kal kal kal samne wale ko phone kiya gaya hai sir. Hmm. Jo jiske against humne ticket raise kari usko phone kiya gaya hai usne ye bola hai ki mujhe saman hi nahi mila hai.
Customer: Achcha saman hi nahi mila hai.
Executive: Haan. Achcha achcha fir to batao fir ab kya hi kare fir. Ab dusri cheez ye aapse bhi discussion hoga but problem kya hai sir dekho aapne mere ko apni problem batai. Aur usko transport ki bilti bhi bheji hui hai usko.
Executive: Ab wo sir dheeme dheeme aage badhegi na baat ab kal sham ko 3 baje aapka action liya tha maine ticket jo raise kiya tha aapka. Lekin wahi hai jab tak mere mere paas sir dekho jab tak koi iska matlab solution nahi aayega tab tak to main kuch bhi nahi kar paunga aur ye solution mat karke dena mujhe ki IndiaMART nahi chala payega wo ye koi solution nahi hai sir IndiaMART nahi chala payega wo IndiaMART to wo waise bhi nahi chala raha na uska koi matlab hai.
Customer: Ab sir hum chala rahe hai hum hume kya mil raha hai IndiaMART mein kuch bhi nahi hai wo uska to waise hi koi kaam nahi aayega wo banda kya karega IndiaMART se kaam karke.
Executive: Ab sir jo best ho payega IndiaMART jis tarike se buyer supplier ka issue resolve karta hai us tarike se aapko support kiya jayega puri tarike se. Theek hai aapke paas IndiaMART se call bhi aayegi. Chalo sir koi baat nahi main call ka wait karta hu. Hmm. Ab sir aisa hua na us time pe maine aapse sir satisfied ka bola tha chaliye koi baat nahi achchi baat hai ki aapne not satisfied mark kiya agar aap satisfied nahi the but wo tha jaise ki thoda bahut.
Customer: Aap mujhe ye batao na Karan ji agar aap meri jagah hote aap kya karte. 
Executive: Sir main aapko whatsapp pe lagatar touch me at least ek bar aap mujhse mujhe aap at least ek bar whatsapp pe text kar dete ki Karan yaar mere pe koi call nahi aaya tumne kya kara hai. Itna to sir ho sakta tha. wo bhi hota batao main in cheezon mein main itna confuse ho gaya hu ki pata nahi maine kaun si galti ki IndiaMART ka package leke. Ab aap keh rahe ho banda keh raha hai ki mere ko saman hi nahi mila ab maine aapko transport ki bilti bhi bheji hui hai. Ji.
Customer: Ab batao sir aur usko puchh lo bhai statement hai tumhare paas aur jo statement mein tumne paisa dala hai 20 25000 wo kyu dala sir jab tumhe saman hi nahi mila to wo kis cheez ke liye dala hua hai.
Executive: Wo sab hoga sir lekin wahi hai dheeme dheeme hoga abhi to 24 hours bhi nahi hue hai na sir internal ticket raise hue hue. Nahi ye to bekar ki baatein hai sir ki saman nahi mila ye hai wo hai ye to aap logon ko waise hi nahi sunni chahiye saman nahi mila.
Customer: Sir aisa thodi hai ki uska paksh sunke baat khatam ho gayi abhi aapka bhi.
Executive: Nahi nahi main waise keh raha hu main waise bata raha hu ye to dekho aapko bhi pata hai ye to nonsense baatein hai ki saman nahi mila. Hmm sahi baat hai sir warna wo aapko block bhi kyu karta. Main main wohi to keh raha hu na mere paas uski call recording hai usne whatsapp pe message kiye hue hai aur uski voice recording usne bheji hui hai. Kyunki wo banda padha likha nahi hai itna to wo text message nahi karta itni to wo call apni wo voice recording karke bhejta hai mujhe. Ji sir.
Customer: Bilkul sahi baat hai sir.
Executive: Ab sir main at last main yahi bolunga aapko jo ticket maine aapke liye raise kiya hai uske upar kaam ho raha hai aapke paas sir call aayega. Theek hai na but thoda sa patience rakhiye agar aapko koi status update chahiye aap sir directly mere ko text karo aapke paas mera personal number hai aap mujhe call karo main aapko pal pal ka update bhi dene ko tayar hu. Nahi wo nahi mere ko dikkat hai sir lekin mere ko jo cheez aapke hath mein nahi hai to usme main aapko kya bolu maine aapko to ek bar bhi nahi kaha ki aap mere ko wo karke do. But you are not satisfied aapne aapne mujhe not satisfied kiya tha na ye to dusri dusre department ka kaam hai aapka kaam nahi hai wo to mere ko bhi malum hai isliye aapko kuch kaha hi nahi hai lekin jo cheez mere ko issue aayegi sir aur aapne mujhe kaha tha ki aapke paas aaj call aa jayega. Ji ji. Ab batao fir main kya karu is cheez ka. Nahi sir call aayega aapke paas aaj kya kehte hai aaj pure din mein aayega phone aapke paas na aaye to sir aap mere ko text karna mere ko call karna sir aapke paas mera personal number bhi hai chaho to main is whatsapp pe dobara bhej deta hu. Nahi nahi mere paas hai sir. Hmm. Abhi to sir fir abhi koi dikkat nahi hai main jo abhi fir se concern raise hua close kar sakta hu main. Sir mere ko ek bar call aane do jab tak mujhe kuch pata hi nahi chalega main kya karunga. Theek hai main wait karta hu. Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Did not receive a call from dispute team.

- Feels confused by conflicting information.

- Expresses frustration with IndiaMART's service.

- Claims to have been defrauded by a buyer.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed action is being taken.

- Assured a call will come, requested patience.

- Offered personal contact for status updates.

- Explained the other party claimed goods not received.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will wait for a call.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- dispute team, fraud, call, resolution, ticket
